projectGridLines.title: Project 1  Title: SDE Intern, Project 2  Title: Android/IOS Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: SDE Intern

Description: 

Key Responsibilities-

· Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop, test, and maintain software applications. 

· Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code. 

· Participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and standards compliance. 

· Assist in identifying and troubleshooting software defects and issues. 

· Demonstrate a strong commitment to learning and self-improvement.

· Communicate effectively with team members and stakeholders.

Skill sets: 

· Strong coding skills in one or more programming languages (e.g., JavaScript, Python etc.). 

· Excellent problem-solving abilities and a strong analytical mindset. 

· Excellent in data structure and algorithms 

· Proven ability to work collaboratively in a team environment. 

· Effective verbal and written communication skills. 

· A passion for learning new technologies and a drive to keep up with industry trends. 

· A strong work ethic and the ability to meet deadlines.

Traits expectation: Data-Structure, Algorithm & Networking, OOPS

Expected learning: Well-designed, testable, efficient code by using best software development practices.

Specific courses required for project execution:  Computer Science

Project 2

Title: Android/IOS Intern

Description:

-Maintaining our iOS/Android apps.

- Building new features for our apps. 

- Use modern development practices to improve the app.

Traits expectation: Some prior experience in native iOS/Android development

Expected learning:

Specific courses required for project execution: Computer Science
